revised_title: Exploring the Structural and Functional Diversities of Phosphoinositide 3-Kinases in Intracellular Signaling Pathways
tldr: The article discusses the diverse roles and structures of phosphoinositide 3-kinases (PI3-kinases) in intracellular signaling pathways. These enzymes are involved in various cellular functions, including protein sorting and cell surface receptor signal complexes. The study analyzes the relationships between PI3-kinases, PI4-kinases, and PI5-kinases, as well as their subgroups, based on their structure and function.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
